pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 5, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, April 5, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

London, Ontario

5:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit 3M Canada.

3M Canada
1840 Oxford Street East     
London, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media must arrive no later than 4:30 p.m.
